title.rendered: Sunny Side, a live comedy broadcast, starts Monday, August 14, 8:30am PST on Sunny Side YouTube

content.rendered:
Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder Bill Allard presents old and new comedy films M-F at 8:30am starting Monday, August 14, 2023.

Jane Wilson

Roger Goodstone (Jim Turner) left and 24/7 (Mark Fite) right.

Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder Bill Allard presents new and old comedy videos M-F at 8:30am PST starting Monday, August 14, 2023.

Future of comedy videos.”

— Sunny Side host Bill Allard

SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA, USA, August 14, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Bill​ Allard, a co-founder of the legendary comedy troupe Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre, presents classic Duck’s Breath comedy videos and premieres original comedy video​s five days a week for thirteen weeks​ starting August 14, 2023 at 8:30am PST on SUNNY SIDE YOUTUBE.

​The 130 original comedy videos Allard’s production company, Duck Spots, produced for the series will be made public in one of twenty Sunny Side Comedy Playlists the day it premieres on the live Sunny Side broadcast.

​The 65 shows will feature the ​writing and performing talents of the legendary ​Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre comedy team and talented friends and associates.

“A wonderful collection of writers and actors producing surreal comedy fun for the entire family,” laughs Allard.

​Sunny Side Feature Comedy Video Playlists.

Monday

RETROSPECTIONS

Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder​ Jim Turner and Mark Fite are interviewed as Hollywood music managers Roger Goldstone and 24/7.​ Scripts developed from live Instagram improvs by Turner and Fite.

Tuesday

JANE WILSON

Jane Wilson provides tips for homemakers.

Wednesday

STERLING

Sterling Dell Zell (Jim Turner) takes phone calls and talks with engineer Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder​ Merle Kessler who also writes the series.

Thursday

TWISTED FAIRY TALES

Written by Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder​ Dan Coffey. Performed by John Fleck.

Friday

LIVE STREAM ONE

Nine human actors produce comedy characters. Two computer programs produce Dave Zank: the host of a 2051 news and information morning stream.​ Final cuts of the 13 ​comedy video​s ​in this series ​will be based on audience feedback​ after it screens on Sunny Side.

Sunny Side Short Comedy Video Playlists.

​HISTORY OF COMEDY

​Written and performed by Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder Leon Martell.

FACTS

​You be the judge.

SHORT STORIES

​Written by Duck’s Breath Mystery Theatre co-founder Dan Coffey.

​AI CHICKEN

Why did the A.I. chicken cross the road.

SUNNY SIDE HOLLYWOOD

​Updates from the front.

“If things go according to plan, SUNNY SIDE YouTube will be the future of comedy videos,” chortles Sunny Side host, Bill Allard.

Bill Allard
Duck Spots
+1 415-309-3647
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Twitter
LinkedIn
YouTube
TikTok

You just read:

News Provided By

August 14, 2023, 04:00 GMT


EIN Presswire’s priority is source transparency. We do not allow opaque clients, and our editors try to be careful about weeding out false and misleading content.
As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,
tries to define some of the boundaries that are reasonable in today’s world. Please see our
Editorial Guidelines
for more information.



Originally published at https://www.einpresswire.com/article/647600746/sunny-side-a-live-comedy-broadcast-starts-monday-august-14-8-30am-pst-on-sunny-side-youtube
